About.title: About Me
About.content:
I'm Fermín, a Freelance Software Developer with a passion for web accessibility working from La Paloma, Uruguay 🏖️ (UTC -03:00)

Most of my experience is in web development working on both simple projects like landing pages and complex ones like web apps, e-commerce sites, blogs, games, etc.

Throughout my 10 year career, I have worked both independently and within teams for various companies, and I have plenty of experience working remotely 👨‍💻

I speak Spanish 🇪🇸 English 🇬🇧 and Italian 🇮🇹 and some French 🇫🇷 and Portuguese 🇧🇷

Keep scrolling to learn more about what kind of projects I'm working on 🚀 some of my client work and the technologies I'm familiar with 🛸

projects.busesuy: A comprehensive search engine for medium and long-distance bus lines in Uruguay. This innovative tool calculates transfer trips, providing users with optimal routes and schedules. It was the first of its kind in the country, addressing a significant gap in public transportation planning and accessibility.
projects.arbolado: An interactive web tool designed to explore and visualize data from tree censuses conducted in various cities. Users can filter and analyze information about tree species, locations and more making it a valuable resource for urban planners, researchers, and nature enthusiasts.
projects.papelapp: A practical web app that helps users calculate the cost per meter of toilet paper rolls. By comparing prices and sizes, it empowers consumers to make informed purchasing decisions, saving both money and resources.
projects.ecouter: A user-friendly web app tailored for language teachers and students. It provides easy access to audio tracks accompanying textbooks.
projects.crabe: A fun two-player cooperative web game inspired by the board game "La Marche Du Crabe".
projects.salam: A fully custom Shopify store theme developed from scratch tailored to the client's requirements and brand identity.
projects.grigadale: A website showcasing the complete collection of trees from a private arboretum. Featuring an intuitive interface, an interactive map, and a blog section. Serving both researchers and nature enthusiasts.
projects.angular: A custom e-commerce platform designed to sell templates for developers working with the Angular framework. The site offers high-quality, professionally designed templates to streamline development workflows.
projects.ionic: A specialized e-commerce site offering templates for developers using the Ionic framework. The platform provides ready-to-use solutions for building cross-platform mobile and web applications, saving time and effort for developers.
projects.atlantico: A professional business website developed for a real estate development company. The site highlights the company's projects, values, and expertise, serving as a digital showcase for potential clients and partners.
projects.pipina: A website for a brand dedicated to creating games that help children with writing and reading difficulties.
